snippet: Minnesota court records say John LaDue told investigators that he planned to first kill his family members, then go to a school to set off bombs and shoot students.
lead_paragraph: Minnesota court records say John LaDue told investigators that he planned to first kill his family members, then go to a school to set off bombs and shoot students.

headline.main: Suspect to Be Tried as Adult in Plot Involving Explosives
headline.print_headline: Suspect to Be Tried as Adult In Plot Involving Explosives
